item.title: AllstarScape v2 Re-Release!
item.dc:creator: @RS2BullDog RS2BullDog
item.description:
@RS2BullDog wrote:

[quote=“DemonWars, post:7, topic:413378”][quote author=RS2BullDog link=topic=514881.msg3749365#msg3749365 date=1315925241]

I think sometimes people forget that they once were new, i sure dont forget
Anyways nice job whoever made it xD

Greetz DemonWars

EDIT: u can add pictures by simply following these steps:
1: go to www.photobucket.com
2: make a free acount
3: upload pictures
4: hold mouse on uploaded picture without clicking
5: you will see a box below the pic with several links
6: click on the image with “IMG” In it it will copy automaticly
7: then go to this site and ur thread and paste

Now u will have pictures

Again watch the video. The video gives everything… Sceriously. Does no one have have any common sence
[/quote]

Ok at first i did, but as he said idk how to upload pictures, i wanted to explain
and second whats ur problem man?[/quote]

I have no problem it’s just when people say add pictures when there is a video… It’s common sense that a video will just be enough

Read full topic
